title: Why should your teammates be able to ban your champion pick?
body:
I was going to play Katrina and the jungler decides to ban her. I told him why he did that and he said " oops sorry", I know he did it on purpose. I was very mad.
Riot please make it so that you can't ban your team's champion picks.

replies.body: Why should your pick hover be able to force a teammate into a game with a champion they do not want to play with?
Why does it matter what some other person thinks about what you play ?

There are over 140 champions in the game. You can always play another one.

If a player does not like to have a certain champion in the game or on their team, they have one ban to use to prevent that champion from being in the game.

Why should you be able to troll your team by preventing a common ban by hovering it when you don't have to pick it?

Also beyond your own ego needing everything to be about you, how do you KNOW this person did it on purpose?  It just seems like an awfully convenient thing to 'know'.

Lock someone into their hover-pick if it isn't subsequently banned?

LOL no that's a terrible idea.

why can't you believe there is good in the world.

also, Banning (for the purpose of it) is so that players can get rid of champions they do not want to face against.
I can ban a champion my team is hovering in fear of the enemy grabbing it, or that I just don't want it on my team.

Sometimes, I ban champions if I feel like it's too much of a chance the enemy team may snag them.

For example, if I see a brand-wannabe last-pick and says he's going brand I'm banning him; unless ofc they will trade with team.

Why couldn't you accept it may have been an accident?

edit: should say I hate playing against brands
Do you have any reason to believe he actually did it on purpose? I've accidentally banned a teammates hover before.
He was being very sarcastic. I have also accidentally banned someone's champ. Riot should make a notifacation pop up when you choose to ban your teammates champion.
they do. before you hit Ban it tells you above the button "you are about to ban a teammates champ" but you probably don't read do you?

That is not really what I had in mind. Also, I know that is there but that doesn't really stop you. That little piece of text doesnt should be bigger and there should be a window that pops up saying "Are you sure you want to ban your teammates champion select"
Because if I look them up and they've done Yasuo support 10 times in a row and lost 10 times in a row, I think I should protect my chances of winning by banning their Yasuo hover if they are support.
MY SITUATION IS WAY DIFFERENT. Katrina is not some troll pick?
I ban team mates picks on purpose if I don't think they'll suit my purposes; hint, my purpose is winning.
Well that is still messed up. Also the guy banned my champion for no reason.

This is actually a viable strategy honestly. I think it's better to ask them nicely "hey it looks like that champ {won't fit the team comp/isn't your best champ/would be better in another lane/whatever} would you consider a different one" but there's not really time for that in ban phase.
